name: Alien Jungle
description:
Created for The Create a Level Game Jam

Aliens have invaded the jungle.  A jaguar is the only thing that can stop them.

The game was designed by me and my  5 yr. old son.

I didn't have time to complete all of the animations, and the game play worked perfectly in Unity, but seems to be a little weird in the actual build.

All assets were created by Billy Newcomb -TobaccoLandStudios
